title: Finance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: German FA slaps down proposal to boycott World Cup as Trump rebuke: ‘debates on sports policy should be conducted internally and not in public’

items.title: One of the most generous welfare states in the world is no match for the ‘motherhood penalty’
items.description: Subsidized child care is available for all children from 6 months old in Denmark, and parents pay no more than 25.%. Pay for women still goes down.

items.title: Arcam Launches New Radia Range Of AV Amps, Processors And Power Amplifiers
items.description: Beautiful design meets power and precision in this new six-product series.

items.title: Why India’s $2.2B Carbon Capture Bet Is About Trade, Not Just Climate
items.description: India’s $2.4B carbon capture investment reveals how trade pressure, EU CBAM, and global shifts are driving climate action as the U.S. falls behind.

items.title: Fed's Miran maintains call for aggressive interest rate cuts this year
items.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran is calling for aggressive interest rate cuts exceeding one percentage point after dissenting in the latest FOMC...

items.title: Oracle billionaire Larry Ellison’s next big bet: Redefining how long–and how well–we live
items.description: As people live longer and birth rates fall, longevity is becoming a major challenge–and opportunity–for business and society alike.

items.title: One Of The Best Sci-Fi Movies Ever Is Back On Netflix, Which Now Seems Ahead Of Its Time
items.description: Netflix has gotten one of the best sci-fi movies of all time back on the service, and now it feels prescient, watching it eleven years later.

items.title: Famed startup incubator Y Combinator to let founders receive funds in stablecoins
items.description: The move is significant since, in the past, generally just crypto VC firms have let startups receive funding in the form of digital assets.

items.title: Kairos, which is building a cross-platform tool for prediction markets traders, raises $2.5 million from a16z crypto
items.description: The startup’s platform will display bets from Kalshi and Polymarket.

items.title: Here's when taxpayers will get their refunds
items.description: The IRS typically processes tax refunds within 21 days for e-filed returns, while mailed returns take six weeks or more to process during the 2025 tax...

items.title: New SNAP work requirements take effect in more states under Trump-backed law
items.description: New SNAP work requirements are taking effect in additional states, expanding eligibility rules and reshaping benefits under a Trump-backed law.

items.title: Costco issues recall notice for bakery item due to undeclared allergen
items.description: Costco has recalled mislabeled "Mini Beignets filled with Caramel" that could cause allergic reactions due to undeclared tree nuts in 22 states.

items.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
items.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

items.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
items.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
